parameters.name: Key
parameters.description:
The tag key.

>  This parameter is required.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: A pagination token. It can be used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If NextToken is empty, no next page exists.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type. Valid values:

*   service: service
*   serviceinstance: service instance
*   artifact: artifact
*   dataset: dataset
